text: Harold Keiser Levering (December 20, 1894 – September 15, 1967) was an American politician and a Republican member of the California State Assembly, representing District 60 from 1948 to 1958, and 1960 to 1962. He served as majority leader of the assembly in 1953.http://www.joincalifornia.com/candidate/632 The Levering Act of 1950 is named after him. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Members of the California State Assembly
title: Harold K. Levering
